summary: 40 kilos of heroin goes missing after a botched undercover transaction and the cops in the involved crime unit are getting killed off one at a time. As trust slowly fades away between them, Max has to deal with his own demons.

keywords: one night stand|male nudity|male frontal nudity|brothel madam|lesbian

title: Vice
